name: MazeSnake
description:
A simple mix of Pac-man and Snake. Instead of avoiding ghosts, you avoid your own tail.

Only comes with three levels, right now.

Play with the arrow keys.

Editor controls:

  • Use the mouse to place the current selection
  • Change selection with the mouse wheel
  • Adjust level size with +, - ,* and / on the numpad

Currently, to add a new level, copy and rename one of the files in the levels folder.
